name: crustysocks
description: A simple pixel art pictionary game

scripts.install: concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint:fix" "cd server && npm run lint:fix"
